body: Seriously, any female heroines in sao born to be raped in any doujinshi, its not really weird, think about how many times author put rape show in his works? As far as i remember, it was 3 times, asuna, shion and kirito students, this author really love rape lmao, not to mention the tentacles parts, no wonder there are tons of sao doujinshis about these 2
